name: 陳詩雯
objective: Introduction to machine learning by Python programming. Regression analysis, dimension reduction, feature extraction, classification methods, neural networks, and LLM. Python examples to improve students' knowledge of machine learning.
schedule:
week1:	Introduction to machine learning
week2:	Probability and optimization
week3:	Feature Extraction
week4:	Bayesian decision theory
week5:	Regression
week6:	Neural Networks
week7:	CNNs
week8:	Hidden Markov Models
week9:	Mid-term presentation
week10:	LSTM and RNN
week11:   Attentions
week12:	Generative Models
week13:	Transformers
week14:	Autoencoders
week15:	Graphical NN
week16:	Case Study
week17:	Case Study
week18:	Final exam
materials:
1. Hui Jiang, Machine learning Fundamentals A Concise Introduction, Cambridge, 2021  
2. 林大貴，圖解 TensorFlow 2 初學篇：實作 tf.keras + Colab 雲端、深度學習、人工智慧、影像辨識，博碩，2022
